text: Osmium pentafluoride is an inorganic compound with the formula OsF5. It is a blue-green solid. Like the pentafluorides of Ru, Rh, and Ir, OsF5 exists as a tetramer in the solid state. == Preparation == Osmium pentafluoride can be prepared by reduction of osmium hexafluoride with iodine as a solution in iodine pentafluoride: :10 OsF6 \+ I2 → 10 OsF5 \+ 2 IF5 == References== Category:Osmium compounds Category:Fluorides
title: Osmium pentafluoride
